trait.name: Standing Leap
text: The ostrich can jump horizontally up to 20 feet and vertically up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Battle Leaper
text: If a riderless ostrich jumps at least 10 feet and lands within 5 feet of a creature, it has advantage on attacks against that creature this turn.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ostrich makes two kicking claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
